description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Beer Pong 2 introduces trickshot levels that allow you to collect caps and purchase upgrades. Upgrades include Ball variations, gravity controls, spin controls, ball paths and more that can all be used in Classic play. Using the new Minimap feature, you can now view the entire field to better aim your shot!
description.short: Beer Pong 2 introduces trickshot levels that allow you to collect caps and purchase upgrades. Upgrades include Ball variations, gravity controls, spin controls, ball paths and more that can all be used in Classic play. Using the new Minimap feature, you can now view the entire field to better aim your shot!
